name: ACK MIINOZ
motto: Just more meat tor my macuahuitl!
story: Jack needs three things in life: a. good cigar, a sawed-off shotgun, and his macuahuitl, a club of ancient elder sign with obsidien blades. Sure, it may seem like primitive weapon, but with it, his Aztec manchester built an empire. Its important to respect:the fraditions, especially when they heal you-to slaughter repulsive monsters summoned from other worlds! With his thick drawl and surly attitude, it can be toughness to get close to Jack. But the:investigator can always rely on hini arid his attack for a ride, of to.dive heal into the-fray.

levels.description: DRIVER RN During a Run, you may take 1 extra investigator with you when leaving a space. (cumulative with Swiftness)
When attack, you have 1 free reroll for each investigator in your space (including you)
Run, you and each other investigator in your space heal 2 stress.
Nee ES When attack, gain for each investigator in your space (including you). )
